languages.text: "Подвергните этого типа испытанию чистоты. Пусть умрет, доказывая свою святость, и не тревожит народ".
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."
languages.original_text: "Подвергните этого типа испытанию чистоты. Пусть умрет, доказывая свою святость, и не тревожит народ".

traits.locale_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness so he can stop troubling the people."
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness so he can stop troubling the people."
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."
"Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

languages.text: «Que pase por el reto de pureza. Que muera intentando demostrar su santidad, y así deje de preocupar a la gente».
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

traits.locale_text: «Que pase por el reto de pureza. Que muera intentando demostrar su santidad, y así deje de preocupar a la gente».

languages.text: « Soumettez-le à l'épreuve de pureté. Qu'il meure en tentant de prouver sa sainteté, ainsi il cessera de haranguer les foules. »
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

traits.locale_text: « Soumettez-le à l'épreuve de pureté. Qu'il meure en tentant de prouver sa sainteté, ainsi il cessera de haranguer les foules. »

languages.text: “让他接受纯洁试炼。让他以生命证明自己的圣洁，少给别人添麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

traits.locale_text: “让他接受纯洁试炼。让他以生命证明自己的圣洁，少给别人添麻烦。”

languages.text: 「彼に純潔の試練を受けさせよ。己の神聖さを証明しようとして死なせれば、少なくとも人々を悩ませることはなくなる」
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

traits.locale_text: 「彼に純潔の試練を受けさせよ。己の神聖さを証明しようとして死なせれば、少なくとも人々を悩ませることはなくなる」

languages.text: "Lasst ihn die Prüfung der Reinheit durchlaufen. Lasst ihn bei dem Versuch sterben, seine Heiligkeit zu beweisen, zumindest, damit er aufhören kann, die Leute zu verstören."
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst ihn die Prüfung der Reinheit durchlaufen. Lasst ihn bei dem Versuch sterben, seine Heiligkeit zu beweisen, zumindest, damit er aufhören kann, die Leute zu verstören."

languages.text: "Onu saflık imtihanına tabi tutun. Kutsallığını kanıtlamaya çalışırken ölürse en azından insanlara sorun çıkarmayı keser."
languages.original_text: "Make him undergo the trial of purity. Let him die trying to prove his holiness, at least so he can stop troubling the people."
